spell_tooltip.description: Colossus Smash causes your next Mortal Strike to deal 15% increased damage and reduce healing taken by 50% for 4 sec.

Your Shout abilities have additional effects.
 Battle Shout:
Increases Stamina by 3%.
 Piercing Howl:
Radius increased by 50%
 Berserker Shout:
Range increased by 8 yds.
 Intimidating Shout:
Cooldown reduced by 15 sec.
 Rallying Cry:
Removes movement impairing effects and grants 30% movement speed to allies.
 Thunderous Roar:
Targets receive 5% more damage from all sources while bleeding.
Disarm the enemy's weapons and shield for 5 sec. Disarmed creatures deal significantly reduced damage.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.
Movement speed increased by 5%.

Your auto-attacks generate 10% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 71,407 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 29,283 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 35,599 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.

Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

Restores 1% health every 1 sec while you are below 35% health. The amount restored increases the closer you are to death.
Mortal Strike and Cleave have a 20% chance to immediately refund 10% of the Rage spent.

Blasts all enemies within 8 yards for 84,833 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

If you have Rend, Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 25,081 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Mortal Strike deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Slam, Cleave, and Whirlwind deal 10% more damage and 10% increased critical strike damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
If Whirlwind or Cleave hits 3 or more enemies it hits them 1 additional time for 30% damage.
While wielding two-handed weapons your damage is increased by 12% and damage taken from area of effect attacks is reduced by 8%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 20% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 313,878 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 834,906 physical damage over 16 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.
Thunderous Roar's cooldown reduced by 45 sec.
Increases the duration of Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect by 2.0 sec and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from all your bleeds.
Activating Avatar grants 8 sec of Sweeping Strikes and while Avatar is active the cooldown of Cleave is reduced by 1.5 sec.
A vicious strike that deals 947,853 Physical damage and reduces the effectiveness of healing on the target by 50% for 10 sec.

Overpower the enemy, dealing 474,982 Physical damage. Cannot be blocked, dodged, or parried.

Increases the damage of your next Mortal Strike or Cleave by 15%, stacking up to 2 times
Overpower increases the damage of your next Mortal Strike or Cleave by 15%, stacking up to 2 times.
Increases your parry chance by 100% and reduces all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Execute no longer has a cooldown and if your foe survives, 10% of the Rage spent is refunded.
Overpower has 2 charges and deals 15% more damage.
You are healed for 85% of the damage dealt by Deep Wounds.
If Cleave or Whirlwind hits 2 or more targets you also Slam your primary target.
You have a 2.0% chance per Rage spent on attacks to reset the remaining cooldown on Overpower.
Smashes the enemy's armor, dealing 382,512 Physical damage and increasing damage you deal to them by 30% for 10 sec.
Critical strike damage of your abilities is increased by 10%.

Wounds the target, causing 156,470 Physical damage instantly and an additional 444,172 Bleed damage over 21 sec.

Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
Every 20 Rage you spend on attacks reduces the remaining cooldown on Warbreaker, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
Mortal Strike and Cleave have a 20% chance to instantly reset their own cooldowns.
Sweeping Strikes lasts 6 sec longer.
Strikes all enemies in front of you for 353,280 Physical damage, inflicting Deep Wounds. Cleave will consume your Overpower effect to deal increased damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Your Bleed effects deal 20% increased damage.
Overpower deals 15% additional damage, has 10% increased critical strike chance, and deals 10% increased critical strike damage.
Warbreaker increases your Haste by 10%, or by 20% if any target is below 35% health. Lasts for the duration of Warbreaker.
Smash the ground and shatter the armor of all enemies within 10 yds, dealing 378,296 Physical damage and increasing damage you deal to them by 30% for 10 sec.
Mastery increased by 4% and Tactician's chance to trigger is increased by an additional 2.0%.
Increases Versatility by 2% and reduces the cooldown of Die by the Sword by 30.0 sec.
Overpower has a 35% chance to reset the cooldown of Mortal Strike and generate 10 Rage.

Deep Wounds, Rend and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effects last 6.0 sec longer and have a 5% increased critical strike chance.

If you have Rend, Mortal Strike inflicts Rend on targets below 35% health.

Throws a whirling weapon at the target location that chases nearby enemies, inflicting 897,989 Physical damage to all enemies over 9.8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 10 Rage each time it deals damage.
Your Mortal Strike, Cleave and Execute critical strike damage is increased by 10% and your Execute has a 5% increased critical hit chance.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Mortal Strike at your target or random nearby enemy.
Whirlwind and Cleave deal 50% increased damage during Ravager or for 9 sec after Bladestorm ends.

Unleash a series of precise and powerful strikes against your target, dealing 2 million damage to it, and 1.1 million damage to enemies within 8 yds of it. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

While channeling Demolish, you take 10% less damage and are immune to stuns, knockbacks, and forced movement effects.

You can block, parry, dodge, and use certain defensive abilities while channeling Demolish.
Critical strike damage of your abilities is increased by 10% and the amount of damage blocked by your critical blocks is increased by 20%.

Colossal Might increases damage dealt by your next Demolish by 10%, stacking up to 10 times.

Mortal Strike grants a stack of Colossal Might and Cleave grants a stack of Colossal Might when it strikes 3 or more targets.
Shockwave also knocks enemies into the air and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Shockwave, Cleave, and Whirlwind deal 5% more damage per target affected up to 5.
Colossal Might increases the damage of your Overpower by 5% per stack.

When your health is brought below 35%, you gain a Second Wind, healing you for 12% of your max health over 2 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 60 sec.
Mortal Strike and Cleave damage increased by 20%.
Mortal Strike critical strikes grant an additional stack of Colossal Might.

You deal 5% more damage and take 5.0% less damage.

Size increased by 5%.

Colossal Might now stacks up to 10 times. If you would gain a stack of Colossal Might and are at max stacks, the cooldown of Demolish is reduced by 2 sec.

Enemies affected by Demolish take up to 10% more damage from you and deal up to 10% less damage to you for 10 sec based on the number of stacks of Colossal Might consumed by Demolish.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.
Movement speed increased by 5%.

Your auto-attacks generate 10% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Run at high speed toward an ally, intercepting all melee and ranged attacks against them for 6 sec while they remain within 10 yds.

Instantly attack the target, causing 72,689 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 29,296 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 34,908 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.

Causes the targeted enemy to cower in fear and up to 5 additional enemies within 8 yards to flee.
Targets are disoriented for 8 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.0% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 24,694 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Cooldown of Die By the Sword, Pummel, Intervene, Spell Reflection, and Storm Bolt reduced by 5%.
Mortal Strike deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Slam, Cleave, and Whirlwind deal 10% more damage and 10% increased critical strike damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.

Go berserk, removing and granting immunity to Fear, Sap, and Incapacitate effects for 6 sec.

Also remove fear effects from group members within 12 yds.
While wielding two-handed weapons your damage is increased by 12% and damage taken from area of effect attacks is reduced by 8%.
Critical strike chance increased by 2% and critical strike damage of Execute increased by 10%.
Gain Strength equal to 20% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 314,243 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 834,906 physical damage over 16 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.

Throw a spear at the target location, dealing 299,276 Physical damage instantly and an additional 329,228 damage over 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Enemies hit are chained to the spear's location for the duration.

Generates 10 Rage.
Thunderous Roar's cooldown reduced by 45 sec.

Activating Avatar grants 6 sec of Recklessness.

The additional Rage generation of this Recklessness is reduced to 25%.
A vicious strike that deals 957,967 Physical damage and reduces the effectiveness of healing on the target by 50% for 10 sec.

Overpower the enemy, dealing 477,981 Physical damage. Cannot be blocked, dodged, or parried.

Increases the damage of your next Mortal Strike or Cleave by 15%, stacking up to 2 times
Overpower increases the damage of your next Mortal Strike or Cleave by 15%, stacking up to 2 times.
Increases your parry chance by 100% and reduces all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Execute no longer has a cooldown and if your foe survives, 10% of the Rage spent is refunded.
Overpower has 2 charges and deals 15% more damage.
Damage from Deep Wounds has a chance to generate 5 Rage.
You are healed for 85% of the damage dealt by Deep Wounds.

Fight through the pain, ignoring 50% of damage taken until 679,350 damage has been prevented.

Repeated uses of Ignore Pain accumulate, up to 3.3 million total damage prevented.
Your attacks have a chance to make your next Execute cost no Rage, be usable on any target regardless of their health, and deal damage as if you spent 40 Rage.
You have a 2.0% chance per Rage spent on attacks to reset the remaining cooldown on Overpower.
Smashes the enemy's armor, dealing 373,242 Physical damage and increasing damage you deal to them by 30% for 10 sec.
Critical strike damage of your abilities is increased by 10%.
Every 20 Rage you spend on attacks reduces the remaining cooldown on Warbreaker, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
Mortal Strike and Cleave have a 20% chance to instantly reset their own cooldowns.
Sweeping Strikes lasts 6 sec longer.
Overpower deals 15% additional damage, has 10% increased critical strike chance, and deals 10% increased critical strike damage.
Warbreaker increases your Haste by 10%, or by 20% if any target is below 35% health. Lasts for the duration of Warbreaker.
Colossus Smash damage increased by 30% and its effect duration is increased by 3.0 sec.
Execute is usable on targets below 35% health.
Mastery increased by 4% and Tactician's chance to trigger is increased by an additional 2.0%.
Increases Versatility by 2% and reduces the cooldown of Die by the Sword by 30.0 sec.
Overpower has a 35% chance to reset the cooldown of Mortal Strike and generate 10 Rage.

Deep Wounds, Rend and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effects last 6.0 sec longer and have a 5% increased critical strike chance.

If you have Rend, Mortal Strike inflicts Rend on targets below 35% health.

Become an unstoppable storm of destructive force, striking all nearby enemies for 1.5 million Physical damage over 4.9 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects, but can use defensive abilities and can avoid attacks.
Your Mortal Strike, Cleave and Execute critical strike damage is increased by 10% and your Execute has a 5% increased critical hit chance.

Mortal Strike and Cleave have a high chance to apply Fatal Mark to enemies above 30% health. When an enemy with Fatal Mark is below 30% health, your next Execute causes the Fatal Mark to deal 341,743 Physical damage per stack.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Mortal Strike at your target or random nearby enemy.
Execute causes the target to take 35% more damage from your next Mortal Strike, stacking up to 2 times.

Every 3 Slayer's Strikes you gain Sudden Death.

Using Sudden Death accelerates your next Bladestorm, striking 1 additional time (max 3). Bladestorm's total duration is unchanged.
Each strike of Bladestorm applies Overwhelmed to all enemies affected, increasing damage you deal to them by 1% for 20 sec, max 10 stacks.
Heroic Leap reduces the cooldown of Charge by 5 sec and Charge reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 2 sec.
You heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sudden Death.
Each strike of Bladestorm deals an additional 10% damage evenly split across all targets.
When Overpower has its cooldown reset by Tactician, your next Overpower deals 25% additional damage and 25% additional critical damage.
Marked for Execution increases the critical strike chance and critical strike damage of your next Execute on the target by 15%.

Mortal Strike and Cleave when it hits 3 or more targets have a 20% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for 469,001 damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Overpower damage increased by 30%.

When you Execute a target that you've Marked for Execution, you both reduce the cooldown of Bladestorm by 5 sec and apply 2 stacks of Overwhelmed to the target per stack of Marked for Execution consumed.

You can use Pummel and Storm Bolt while Bladestorming.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Charge removes all movement impairing effects, this effect cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.
You heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sudden Death.
Your next Mortal Strike after Bladestorm ends deals 50% additional damage.
When Overpower has its cooldown reset by Tactician, your next Overpower deals 25% additional damage and 25% additional critical damage.

Mortal Strike grants a stack of Colossal Might and Cleave grants a stack of Colossal Might when it strikes 3 or more targets.
Shockwave also knocks enemies into the air and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Shockwave, Cleave, and Whirlwind deal 5% more damage per target affected up to 5.
Colossal Might increases the damage of your Overpower by 5% per stack.

When your health is brought below 35%, you gain a Second Wind, healing you for 12% of your max health over 2 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 60 sec.
Mortal Strike and Cleave damage increased by 20%.
Mortal Strike critical strikes grant an additional stack of Colossal Might.

You deal 5% more damage and take 5.0% less damage.

Size increased by 5%.

Colossal Might now stacks up to 10 times. If you would gain a stack of Colossal Might and are at max stacks, the cooldown of Demolish is reduced by 2 sec.

Enemies affected by Demolish take up to 10% more damage from you and deal up to 10% less damage to you for 10 sec based on the number of stacks of Colossal Might consumed by Demolish.
Disarm the enemy's weapons and shield for 5 sec. Disarmed creatures deal significantly reduced damage.
Rampage, Onslaught, and Odyn's Fury damage reduce healing the target receives by 3% for 12 sec, stacking up to 12 times.

Your Shout abilities have additional effects.
 Battle Shout:
Increases Stamina by 3%.
 Piercing Howl:
Radius increased by 50%
 Berserker Shout:
Range increased by 8 yds.
 Intimidating Shout:
Cooldown reduced by 15 sec.
 Rallying Cry:
Removes movement impairing effects and grants 30% movement speed to allies.
 Thunderous Roar:
Targets receive 5% more damage from all sources while bleeding.

An aggressive combat state that increases the damage of your auto-attacks by 15% and reduces the duration of Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects on you by 10%.

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.
Movement speed increased by 5%.

Your auto-attacks generate 10% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 74,337 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 28,820 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 35,186 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.

Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

Restores 1% health every 1 sec while you are below 35% health. The amount restored increases the closer you are to death.
Mortal Strike and Cleave have a 20% chance to immediately refund 10% of the Rage spent.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.0% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 24,910 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Mortal Strike deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Your auto-attacks have a 20% chance to hurl weapons at your target and 3 other enemies in front of you, dealing an additional 30,843 Physical damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
While dual wielding your damage is increased by 6% and movement speed is increased by 4%.
Critical strike chance increased by 2% and critical strike damage of Execute increased by 10%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 20% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 313,278 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 834,906 physical damage over 16 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.
Activating Avatar or Recklessness grants 8 sec of the other.

Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 398,737 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Generates 8 Rage.

A mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 370,789 Physical damage.

Generates 12 Rage.
Enrage increases your Haste by 15% and increases your movement speed by 10%.
Reduces damage taken by 30% and Bloodthirst restores an additional 20% health for 8 sec. Usable while stunned or incapacitated.
Execute no longer costs Rage and now generates 20 Rage.
Bloodthirst damage increased by 10%.
You take 10% reduced damage while Enrage is active.
Your attacks have a chance to reset the cooldown of Execute and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.
While Enraged, Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage.
While Enraged, your auto-attacks can no longer miss.
Enrages you and unleashes a series of 4 brutal strikes for a total of 569,641 Physical damage.
Raging Blow has 2 charges and has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Bloodthirst critical strikes generate 4 additional Rage and inflict a Gushing Wound that leeches 330,971 health over 12 sec.
Bloodthirst deals 50% increased damage to enemies who are below 35% health.
Rampage increases your Haste by 2% for 12 sec, stacking up to 4 times. This effect is reset if you Rampage a different primary target.
Each Rampage strike has a 25% chance to refund a charge of Raging Blow.
Raging Blow causes every strike of your next Rampage to deal an additional 20% damage, stacking up to 5 times.
Execute increases the critical strike chance of Execute by 10% for 15 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Raging Blow increases the critical strike chance of your next Bloodthirst by 15% until it critically strikes, stacking up to 5 times.
Go berserk, increasing all Rage generation by 100% and granting your abilities 20% increased critical strike chance for 12 sec.
Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage and while Enraged, Raging Blow has a 10% increased chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Mastery increased by 2% and if you are Enraged, Bloodthirst extends your Enrage by 1.0 sec.
Haste increased by 2% and Raging Blow and Bloodthirst generate an additional 2 Rage.

Become an unstoppable storm of destructive force, striking all nearby enemies for 1.5 million Physical damage over 4.9 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects, but can use defensive abilities and can avoid attacks.

Activating Recklessness generates 50 Rage and while Recklessness is active, Raging Blow and Bloodthirst are replaced by Crushing Blow and Bloodbath.

 Crushing Blow
Strike a mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 443,715 Physical damage. 

Crushing Blow has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown and its critical strikes deal 20% additional damage.

Generates 12 Rage.

 Bloodbath
Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 474,392 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Bloodbath causes the target to bleed for 163,442 damage over 12 sec. Using Bloodbath on a target that is affected by Bloodbath extends the bleed by 12 sec.

Generates 8 Rage.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Mortal Strike at your target or random nearby enemy.
Recklessness lasts 4.0 sec longer.

Your attacks against your primary target have a high chance to overwhelm their defenses and trigger a Slayer's Strike, dealing 412,398 damage and applying Marked for Execution, increasing the damage they take from your next Execute by 15%. Stacks 3 times.

Every 3 Slayer's Strikes you gain Sudden Death.

Using Sudden Death accelerates your next Bladestorm, striking 1 additional time (max 3). Bladestorm's total duration is unchanged.
Each strike of Bladestorm applies Overwhelmed to all enemies affected, increasing damage you deal to them by 1% for 20 sec, max 10 stacks.

Charge increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Charge removes all movement impairing effects, this effect cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.
You heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sudden Death.
Your next Mortal Strike after Bladestorm ends deals 50% additional damage.
Mortal Strike critical strikes increase the damage of your next Mortal Strike by 20%.
Marked for Execution increases the critical strike chance and critical strike damage of your next Execute on the target by 15%.

Mortal Strike and Cleave when it hits 3 or more targets have a 20% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for 463,677 damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Overpower damage increased by 30%.

When you Execute a target that you've Marked for Execution, you both reduce the cooldown of Bladestorm by 5 sec and apply 2 stacks of Overwhelmed to the target per stack of Marked for Execution consumed.

You can use Pummel and Storm Bolt while Bladestorming.

Throws a whirling weapon at the target location that chases nearby enemies, inflicting 895,356 Physical damage to all enemies over 9.8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Thunder Clap damage increased by 40%.

Lightning Strikes also deal 37,321 to enemies near their target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Shield Slam damage increased by 15%.

Bloodthirst and Rampage damage increased by 25%.

Shield Slam and Bloodthirst have a 35% chance to grant you Thunder Blast, stacking up to 2 charges.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals Stormstrike damage and generates 2 Rage.
Storm Bolt also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning them for 2 sec, but its cooldown is increased by 10 sec.

Stamina increased by 5%.

Thunder Blast calls down a Lightning Strike on an enemy it hits.

Lightning Strikes generate 3 Rage.

While Avatar is not active, Lightning Strikes have a 10% chance to grant you Avatar for 4 secs.

Mortal Strike and Cleave when it hits 3 or more targets have a 20% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for 452,379 damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Overpower damage increased by 30%.

When you Execute a target that you've Marked for Execution, you both reduce the cooldown of Bladestorm by 5 sec and apply 2 stacks of Overwhelmed to the target per stack of Marked for Execution consumed.

You can use Pummel and Storm Bolt while Bladestorming.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Your auto-attacks generate 10% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 72,811 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 29,469 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 35,573 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.
Mortal Strike and Cleave have a 20% chance to immediately refund 10% of the Rage spent.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Blasts all enemies within 8 yards for 85,368 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

If you have Rend, Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 24,681 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Cooldown of Die By the Sword, Pummel, Intervene, Spell Reflection, and Storm Bolt reduced by 5%.
Mortal Strike deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Shockwave's range increased by 6 yards and when it strikes at least 3 targets its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Slam, Cleave, and Whirlwind deal 10% more damage and 10% increased critical strike damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
If Whirlwind or Cleave hits 3 or more enemies it hits them 1 additional time for 30% damage.
While wielding one-handed weapons your damage is increased by 6% and Leech increased by 4%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 20% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 316,301 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 834,906 physical damage over 16 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.
Thunderous Roar's cooldown reduced by 45 sec.
Increases the duration of Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect by 2.0 sec and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from all your bleeds.
Avatar increases the damage of Thunder Clap and Shockwave by 50% and reduces the cooldown of Thunder Clap by 50%.

Fight through the pain, ignoring 50% of damage taken until 679,350 damage has been prevented.

Repeated uses of Ignore Pain accumulate, up to 3.3 million total damage prevented.

Swing in a wide arc, dealing 88,495 Physical damage to all enemies in front of you. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Your successful dodges and parries have a chance to make your next Revenge cost no Rage.
Demoralizes all enemies within 10 yards, reducing the damage they deal to you by 20% for 8 sec.
Your auto-attacks deal an additional 54,791 Physical damage and have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Increases maximum health by 30% for 15 sec and instantly heals you for that amount.
Revenge deals 10% more damage, or 20% more damage when your successful dodges or parries have made it cost no Rage.
Devastate, Thunder Clap, Revenge, and Execute have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Using Shield Slam increases the damage of Shield Slam by 10% and the block value of your shield by 5% for 16 sec. Stacking up to 3 times.
Taunts all enemies within 10 yds to attack you for 6 sec.

Devastate deals 20% increased damage and generates 2 Rage.

Devastator deals 10% increased damage and generates 2 Rage.

Wounds the target, causing 48,605 Physical damage instantly and an additional 159,343 Bleed damage over 15 sec.

Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
10% of damage you deal adds to your active Ignore Pain.
Taunts all enemies within 14 yds to attack you for 6 sec, interrupts all spellcasting within 14 yds and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 6 sec.

Increases the radius of Demoralizing Shout by 5 yards.

Each enemy hit by Thunder Clap reduces the remaining cooldown on Demoralizing Shout by 1.5 sec, up to 4.5 sec.
Reduces all damage you take by 40% for 8 sec.
You are able to block spells for 30 sec.
You gain 2% Haste for each enemy or ally within 10 yards, up to 8% Haste.
Shield Block lasts 2 sec longer.
Every 20 Rage you spend on attacks reduces the remaining cooldown on Warbreaker, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
Shield Wall gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 60 sec.
Shield Slam deals 10% increased damage and reduces enemies' damage against you by 3% for 9 sec. Multiple punishments may overlap.
Increases Strength and Armor by 5% and your critical strike chance by 1%.
Increases Block chance by 12% and your Block value by 24%.
Increases Stamina and Armor by 8% and your Haste by 2%.

Charge to an enemy with your shield, dealing 519,086 Physical damage to it and 166,166 Physical damage to all enemies within 10 yards.

Also stuns the primary target for 4 sec.

Generates 20 Rage.
Demoralizing Shout also generates 20 Rage and increases damage you deal to affected targets by 20%.
Every 250 rage you spend triggers a Violent Outburst, causing your next Shield Slam or Thunder Clap to deal 200% increased damage, generate 50% more Rage and grant Ignore Pain.
Shield Charge deals 20% increased damage, grants you Shield Block, and makes your next Revenge cost no Rage.

When your health is brought below 30%, you take 80% less damage for 8 sec and healing you receive is increased by 100%.

Cannot occur more than once every 3 min.
Critical strike damage of your abilities is increased by 10% and the amount of damage blocked by your critical blocks is increased by 20%.

Colossal Might increases damage dealt by your next Demolish by 10%, stacking up to 10 times.

Mortal Strike grants a stack of Colossal Might and Cleave grants a stack of Colossal Might when it strikes 3 or more targets.
Shockwave also knocks enemies into the air and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Shockwave, Cleave, and Whirlwind deal 5% more damage per target affected up to 5.
Colossal Might increases the damage of your Overpower by 5% per stack.
Damage prevented by each use of Ignore Pain is increased by 20%.
Mortal Strike and Cleave damage increased by 20%.
Mortal Strike critical strikes grant an additional stack of Colossal Might.

You deal 5% more damage and take 5.0% less damage.

Size increased by 5%.

Colossal Might now stacks up to 10 times. If you would gain a stack of Colossal Might and are at max stacks, the cooldown of Demolish is reduced by 2 sec.

Enemies affected by Demolish take up to 10% more damage from you and deal up to 10% less damage to you for 10 sec based on the number of stacks of Colossal Might consumed by Demolish.
